GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: Google Drive Folder ID. If this is a Team Drive dont forget to set IS_TEAM_DRIVE to True

TELEGRAPH_TOKEN.description: Get it by Running generate_telegraph_token.py in your PC itself

DOWNLOAD_DIR.description: Directory Where Downloaded Files to be stored

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: If Team Drive Set this to True

INDEX_URL.description: if you use a G-Index Enter the URL without a Trailing /

USE_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS.description: Give this True if you use Service Accounts Instead of Refresh Token

STOP_DUPLICATE_MIRROR.description: if this field is set to True , bot will check file in drive(With the File Name Only), if it is present in drive, downloading will Be stopped.

SA_ZIP_URL.description: If USE_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS is Given true. Service Accounts ZIP URL.It Should be Zipped Such that it should have a folder named accounts with SA in it

TOKEN_PICKLE_URL.description: if You are Not Using Service Accounts. Give a link to token.pickle generated. Probably G-Index Link is Recommended
